member.name: T:Graphical_Programming_Language.Circle
member.summary: Derived class Circle which inherits abstract class Shape to represent circle shape being drawn on graphics.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.Circle.radius
member.summary: Variable to store the radius of the circle.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.Circle.#ctor(System.Drawing.Color,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Parameterized constructor Circle which initializes an instance of the class Circle with specified parameters. The color, fill, x and y parameters are passed to base class Shape constructor.
member.param: Colour of the circle.
For circle to be filled or not.
X coordinate from where the circle will be drawn.
Y coordinate from where the circle will be drawn.
Radius for the size of the circle.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.Circle.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Abstract method draw inherited from base class to be overriden in derived class Circle to draw circle on the graphics.
member.param: Graphics object on which the circle will be drawn.

member.name: T:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser
member.summary: CommandParser class to parse and execute the commands to draw in graphics.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.validCommands
member.summary: Array of valid command name that can used.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.command
member.summary: Array to store the current running command with its values.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.commandValues
member.summary: List to store only values or parameters of the command in integer datatype.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.Shapes
member.summary: List to store drawn shapes to persist the drawing in the panel.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.xPos
member.summary: Variable to store X coordinate from where the drawing will start. Initially set to 0.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.yPos
member.summary: Variable to store X coordinate from where the drawing will start. Initially set to 0.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.commandName
member.summary: Variable to only store current running command name.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.commandStringValue
member.summary: Variable to store current command value in string.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.isValidCommand
member.summary: Variable to set the flag of current command name being valid. Initially set to false.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.isValidParameters
member.summary: Variable to set the flag of current command value or parameters being valid. Initially set to false.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.fill
member.summary: Variable to set the flag of the shape being either filled or not filled. Initially set to false.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.color
member.summary: Variable to store the current color used to draw. Initially set to black.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser._messageDisplayer
member.summary: Instance of IMessageDisplayer interface created used to display error message.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.#ctor(Graphical_Programming_Language.IMessageDisplayer)
member.summary: Parameterized constructor which initializes a new instance of the Command_Parser class that takes instance of IMessageDisplayer interface as parameter to display error messages.
member.param: Instance of IMessageDisplayer interface to display error messages.

member.name: P:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.Command
member.summary: Getter and setter methods for the command array to get or set the current command with its values.

member.name: P:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.IsValidCommand
member.summary: Getter method to get boolean value of a command name being valid or not.

member.name: P:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.IsValidParameters
member.summary: Getter method to get boolean value of a command parameters being valid or not.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.GetShapes
member.summary: Getter method to return list of stored drawn shapes.
member.returns: Return the list of drawn shapes.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.ValidateCommandName
member.summary: Boolean method to verify if a command name is valid or not by passing it and checking if it is in the validCommands array.
member.returns: Returns true if command name is valid if not returns false.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.ValidateParameters
member.summary: Boolean method to verify if command parameters are valid or not by checking for specific values and length of the command array or commandValues array.
member.returns: Returns true if command parameters are valid if not returns false.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.GetShapeType(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Method to get the type of shapes according to the shape name.
member.returns: Returns instance of inherited class of base class Shape.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.CommandParser.RunCommand(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Void method to run the commands after being verified by ValidateCommandName and ValidateParameters.
member.param: Graphics object taken as parameter to draw the shapes on.

member.name: T:Graphical_Programming_Language.DisplayMessageBox
member.summary: Class that implements IMessageDisplayer to display the error message in MessageBox.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.DisplayMessageBox.DisplayMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Implementing method from IMessageDisplayer interface to show the error messages in MessageBox.
member.param: The error message to be displayed in the MessageBox.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.Form_SPL.Shapes
member.summary: List to store all the drawn shapes and persist it in the panel.

member.name: F:Graphical_Programming_Language.Form_SPL.multiCommands
member.summary: Array to store multiple commands provided by the user.

member.summary: Variable to set the flag of syntax button being clicked.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.Form_SPL.#ctor
member.summary: Empty Constructor to initialize on instance of the Form_SPL class. Creates graphic object of drawing on the panel and sets the syntaxChecked to false each time the class is initialized.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.Form_SPL.Pnl_Paint_Paint(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Panel paint event listener to draw and persist the drawing in the panel.
member.param: The object that triggered the event of syntax button being clicked.
The arguments of the syntax button click event.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.Form_SPL.SplitCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Method to split the string command and return it in an array.
member.param: The command in string.
member.returns: Splits the string and returns it in an array.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.Form_SPL.Btn_Syntax_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Syntax button click event handler to check the event of syntax button being clicked. When button is clicked it checks which textbox has input and according to it validates the command name and parameters. Calls ValidateCommandName() and ValidateParameters() from CommandParser to validate the command name and parameters once the button is clicked.
member.param: The object that triggered the event of syntax button being clicked.
The arguments of the syntax button click event.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.Form_SPL.Btn_Run_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Run button click event handler to run the commands when the run button is clicked. Run button event handler only runs the command if the syntax button is clicked and also if the command name and parameters are valid. Run button works if command is written in single or multi-line textbox.
member.param: The object that triggered the event of run button being clicked.
The arguments of the run button click event.

member.name: M:Graphical_Programming_Language.Form_SPL.ExitToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
